Detailed Description

Class SoundBrowserApp implements a sound browser.

ServiceResult SoundBrowserApp::GetResourceNames (  Vector< Path > &  paths,
const SoundFilter &  sound_filter = SoundFilter()
) 
 

GetResourceNames returns a list of paths for all available sounds according to the given sound filter in snd_filter argument. If snd_filter argument is a null object, the path of all images should be returned.

Parameters:
paths The list of paths is returned in paths argument.
snd_filter. The filter that should be applied for the search. If snd_filter argument is a null object, the amount of all sounds should be returned.

ServiceResult SoundBrowserApp::SaveSound (  const BinData *  raw_data,
const Path &  path,
DrmMimeType  drm_mime_type,
MimeType  mime_type
) 
 

SaveSound stores the sound given in sound argument at the location given in path argument.

Parameters:
sound The sound that should be stored. If sound argument is a null object, the invocation should be ignored, but ServResSuccess should be returned.
path Path for storing location of the sound. Modification of the storage location should only be possible, if the path argument is a null object.
drm_mime_type Mime type for Digital Rights Management (DRM) information object for the given image. If DRM Mime type is set to DrmNone, the image is not DRM protected.
mime_type The Mime type of the image. if the mime type is unknown or invalid, the image is ???

ServiceResult SoundBrowserApp::SelectSound (  MediaRefPtr &  media_ref_ptr,
const SoundFilter &  snd_filter = SoundFilter()
) 
 

SelectSound presents a list of available sounds filtered using snd_filter argument. If no sound is available, an empty list should be presented. If snd_filter argument is a null object, the list of sounds should not be filtered. If a sound has been selected and the selection has been confirmed, the sound is returned in snd_ref argument, otherwise snd_ref argument is a null object. This Service method is not re-entrant.
